channel.title: [DODIAN]Mining as fast as woodcutting
channel.description:
Hey .. I was wondering if anyone can help me with this . .Im using Devo 7.0 .. And Woodcutting is more or less extremely fast and doesnt stop woodcutting everytime it says ' You get a log '
Where-as Mining goes really slow and stops everytime it says ' You get an ore'
Can anybody help me making mining as fast as woodcutting? Thanks :)

item.title: [DODIAN]Mining as fast as woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

No i dont have tha but it made it help alot thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [DODIAN]Mining as fast as woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @army_life army_life
item.description:
@army_life wrote:

Try searching for the rock ID if you have mining on your server already like

case 2090: case 2091: //copper rock if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1267 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1269 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1271 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1273 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You get some copper ore."); addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[14]), 14); actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(625); addItem(436,1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You mined some copper!"); }else{ sendMessage("This rock is out of ore!!"); } break;

That is mine I made where you see

actionTimer = 30;

Change that to what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: [DODIAN]Mining as fast as woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:8, topic:236207”][quote author=jac link=topic=311633.msg2484843#msg2484843 date=1223758358]

Search for the mining timer and lower it…

Thats what i did but theres no mining timer lol…
[/quote]
Trust me there is. Otherwise how could the server tell when to add a mining ore when you are mining?[/quote]

Good Point but seriosly the only timers are actiontimers whic are set to 0 & 1 which is not helpfull

Read full topic

@daniel89 wrote:

For real thats how mining is set so once you get the ore the ore isnt in the rock no more… so you move on to the next rock… unless u want it like rsc wher eu gotta click over n over to mine so you click once and you strike the rock once then u gotta reclick lol…

item.title: [DODIAN]Mining as fast as woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

jac:

Im sorry but your mistaken, i need help for mining i have woodcutting - I just want my mining to go much faster and not stop when it says ’ you got an ore ’

That’s kind of how mining is supposed to be…

Anyways, like I said, take the woodcutting codes from that tutorial that I pointed you to, and convert the codes, so it works for mining instead, I’m pretty sure that tutorial has the repeating emote and you keep getting the logs, so it should work for mining too.

Read full topic
